s3linkudk.onConnected: Register code to run when the micro:bit is connected to over Bluetooth
s3linkudk.onConnected|param|body: Code to run when a Bluetooth connection is established
s3linkudk.onDisconnected: Register code to run when a bluetooth connection to the micro:bit is lost
s3linkudk.onDisconnected|param|body: Code to run when a Bluetooth connection is lost
s3linkudk.onDisplayTextReceived: Registers code to run when the device receives a display text.
s3linkudk.startService: Start and advertise the S3Link BLE Service.
